title: Almost Matched (Almost Bad Boys) - Peart, A.O_.epub
description:
Twenty-five-year-old Natalie Davenport lugs substantial baggage. One boyfriend after the next has been a total disaster, leaving Natalie distrustful toward the male population in general. So when Colin Hampton crosses her path, sheÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s cautious. Her heart (and some other body parts!) nudges her to go for it, while her head wants her to run for the hills. Will he steal her heart and stomp over it like other guys did?
